tool_description: Translate text from images, convert text to speech across 100+ languages,protecting specific words from translating specific words, and seamlessly translate multiple texts in various languages with a single request. name: Easy Transalation API
title: Easy Transalation API

api_list.name: Supported languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://easy-transalation-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/translator/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easy-transalation-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
